Sentencas: Gadolinia-doped ceria (GDC), a mixed ionic-electronic conductor, was used to fabricate a Ni-GDC/GDC/Pt solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for syngas generation over Ni-GDC anodes in direct-methane SOFCs

Sentencas: The Ni-GDC anode has a composition of Ni:GDC = 3:5 in weight.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for syngas generation over Ni-GDC anodes in direct-methane SOFCs

Sentencas: A new phenomenon of electrochemical promotion of lattice-oxygen extraction from GDC bulk is observed during direct methane oxidation, in the absence of anode-side gas-phase oxygen, to generate syngas at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for syngas generation over Ni-GDC anodes in direct-methane SOFCs

Sentencas: The extraction of markedly higher amount of oxygen than that of the measured current is promoted.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for syngas generation over Ni-GDC anodes in direct-methane SOFCs

Sentencas: This effect increases as the potential (the generated voltage) increases.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for syngas generation over Ni-GDC anodes in direct-methane SOFCs

Sentencas: Both rates of CO and CO2 formations are linearly related to the measured current density but inversely linearly related to the voltage.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for syngas generation over Ni-GDC anodes in direct-methane SOFCs

Sentencas: The formation rate of CO depends on the rate of oxygen supply to the anode surface and its dependence is stronger than that Of CO2.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for syngas generation over Ni-GDC anodes in direct-methane SOFCs

Sentencas: As the oxygen-supply rate increases, both methane conversion and CO selectivity increase.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for syngas generation over Ni-GDC anodes in direct-methane SOFCs

Sentencas: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction enhances the syngas generation.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for syngas generation over Ni-GDC anodes in direct-methane SOFCs
